name: Book Pillow & Pincushion
description:
Download this digital PDF pattern, print it out, assemble it into a little pattern booklet, and have fun sewing! PatchworkPottery patterns include metric conversion chart, stitches & terms section, illustrated step-by-step instructions, and full size templates.

This one's for all those book lovers out there...
Now you can add plush book pillows to your favourite reading spot! You can choose from 2 sizes of pillows with options to sew the book closed or include a secret message inside the book that you can open and read. This pattern also includes a small pincushion-sized book which would make a great gift even for someone who doesn't sew!

Finished sizes: 
pincushion - 3 1/2 x 4" (2" thick)
small pillow - 7 x 8" (4" thick)
large pillow - 10 x 12" (5" thick)

INSTANT DOWNLOAD 
File size: 2.9MB 
Sewing Level: 3 out of 5 buttons

*This pattern is for personal use only! Do not sell items made with this pattern. Do not share or copy any part of this pattern. Thank you.

name: Tis the Season
description:
Download this digital PDF pattern, print it out, assemble it into a little pattern booklet, and have fun sewing! PatchworkPottery patterns include metric conversion chart, stitches & terms section, illustrated step-by-step instructions, and full size templates. 

'Tis the Season wall-hanging features fusible web applique, simple paper-piecing & embroidery. The PDF actually includes the cover pages, 6 instruction pages, 4 template pages & booklet assembly instructions.

name: SpringTime Bag
description:
Download this digital PDF pattern, print it out, assemble it into a little pattern booklet, and have fun sewing! PatchworkPottery patterns include metric conversion chart, stitches & terms section, illustrated step-by-step instructions, and full size templates. 

Carry a splash of Springtime all year round!

This large messenger-style quilted bag is perfect for carrying books or crafting supplies. It has a flowerpot-shaped pocket, and a loop and button closure. This project includes pillowcase applique, basic embroidery & hand-sewn bias binding. *The Butterfly Keychain pattern is not included.
Finished size: 12" x 14-1/2" with a 41" handle

Teacup pouches are a perfect size for carrying all your basics. Originally featured in "Pretty Little Purses & Pouches", this pattern now includes templates for CoffeeMug & HotCocoa pouches, detailed instructions for installing the zipper as well as making the handle and tea tag zipper pull.

name: Crane Star Pillow
description:
Download this digital PDF pattern, print it out, assemble it into a little pattern booklet, and have fun sewing! PatchworkPottery patterns include metric conversion chart, stitches & terms section, illustrated step-by-step instructions, and full size templates. 

The Crane Star is a versatile pattern made up of 6 individual cranes. Paper-piecing allows the quilter to create intricate blocks with accuracy and ease. The fabric is sewn directly to the paper template. This pattern includes instructions for basic paper-piecing technique as well as layout  & instructions for a Crane Star pillow cover. Try joining rows of half Crane Stars to make a matching quilt!

Finished size: 19" x 19"

File size: 3.5MB
Sewing Level: 4 out of 5 buttons

description:

Butterfly Potholders are geared toward intermediate level quilters and will take 2-3 hours to complete. The project includes hand applique, basic embroidery & hand-sewn bias binding. Butterfly Potholders are a lovely way to make your kitchen come to life!
